message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SE 

The paper discusses the security risks and financial damage caused by botnet activities in the IoT, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The paper also focuses on developing a network forensic mechanism based on machine learning techniques, which involves the use of network flow identifiers and data analysis, indicating the relevance of networking and internet architecture (cs.NI). The use of machine learning techniques for training and validating a model for defining botnet attacks suggests the relevance of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the paper discusses the limitations of existing network forensic techniques and proposes a new approach, indicating the relevance of software engineering (cs.SE).
